title: Attendance at Cineplex cinemas 2010 to 2018
summary: In general Attendance in millions has stayed the same over the Year.
Attendance in millions is slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2018.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Attendance in millions, of value 70.4 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Attendance in millions about 69.27 was reached at Year 2018
